metadata.title: CVE-2018-20536 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: There is a heap-based buffer over-read atliblas::SpatialReference::GetGTIF() (spatialreference.cpp) in libLAS 1.8.1that will cause a denial of service.

criterions.comment: liblas: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
